message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $11,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you, given its potential.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $12,000. Would you be willing to consider a price closer to $9,000?

Hi Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your position, however, the value of this product is quite high, and $9,000 is significantly below what I'm looking for. Could you meet me halfway at $10,000?
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to lower the price to $9,500?
